name: Cyntacs
tagline: A fairly simple code editor written in python
body:
# Welcome to the Cyntacs Main Page!



## What is it?
Cyntacs is a small, lightweight code editor written in python.

## What can it do?
Cyntacs can:
* open text-based files
* highlight syntax based on a custom-defined "SyntaxDefs.txt" file, where you can specify what you want to highlight, and what color you want it to be
* undo and redo
* open files through the "open with..." command in windows

## where can I download a .exe file?
you can download a .exe from [here](https://github.com/coderman64/Cyntacs/raw/master/dist/Cyntacs.zip).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
